projects.title: Multi-Layered Agentic AI Systems for Autonomous Work Orchestration
description: Achieved ~60% reduction in project planning time and ~40% improvement in execution consistency through a hierarchical agentic architecture orchestrating 3+ LLMs.

projects.title: URL Shortener using Model Context Protocol (MCP)
description: Designed the system with scalable FastMCP tools and clean HTTP routing deployed on Kubernetes on MicroK8s.

projects.title: Agentic AI Workflow Automation
description: Orchestrated an agentic AI workflow integrating OpenHands with Llama 3.2 and Kubernetes for automated task execution.

projects.title: JSON to TOON Converter
description: Built a full-stack JSON to TOON conversion platform achieving ~40% payload size reduction, exposing REST APIs and a web UI.
